curriculum.question: Business & Leadership
curriculum.korean: 귀사의 서비스에 대해 문의하고자 글을 씁니다.
curriculum.english: I am writing to inquire about your services.

grammarTip.title: Formal Language
grammarTip.explanation: 격식 있는 비즈니스 영어는 간결하고 정중해야 합니다. 'I want' 대신 'I would like', 'Tell me' 대신 'Please inform me'를 사용합니다.
examples: I would appreciate it if you could...

curriculum.question: Business & Leadership
curriculum.english: Please find attached the report for your review.

curriculum.question: Business & Leadership
curriculum.english: I look forward to hearing from you soon.

curriculum.question: Business & Leadership
curriculum.english: We regret to inform you that your application was rejected.

curriculum.question: Business & Leadership
curriculum.english: I would appreciate it if you could respond by Friday.

curriculum.question: Business & Leadership
curriculum.english: Should you have any questions, please contact me.

curriculum.question: Business & Leadership
curriculum.korean: 이 건에 대한 신속한 처리에 감사드립니다.
curriculum.english: Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

curriculum.question: Business & Leadership
curriculum.english: We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

curriculum.question: Business & Leadership
curriculum.english: It brings me great pleasure to welcome you.

curriculum.question: Business & Leadership
curriculum.english: Sincerely yours, John Doe.

curriculum.question: Business & Leadership
curriculum.korean: 가격을 낮춰주신다면 귀하의 조건에 동의할 수 있습니다.
curriculum.english: We can agree to your terms, provided that the price is lowered.

chunks.text: provided that the price is lowered

curriculum.question: Business & Leadership
curriculum.english: Unless we reach a compromise, the deal is off.

curriculum.question: Business & Leadership
curriculum.english: Let's focus on the mutual benefits.

curriculum.question: Business & Leadership
curriculum.korean: 이 제안은 원칙적으로 받아들일 만해 보입니다.
curriculum.english: This proposal seems acceptable in principle.

curriculum.question: Business & Leadership
curriculum.korean: 불행히도 지금은 귀하의 제안을 받아들일 수 없습니다.
curriculum.english: Unfortunately, we cannot accept your offer at this time.

curriculum.question: Business & Leadership
curriculum.english: Alternative options should be considered.

curriculum.question: Business & Leadership
curriculum.korean: 결론은 우리가 시간이 더 필요하다는 것입니다.
curriculum.english: The bottom line is that we need more time.

curriculum.question: Business & Leadership
curriculum.english: Is there any room for negotiation?

curriculum.question: Business & Leadership
curriculum.english: We propose a strategic partnership.

curriculum.question: Business & Leadership
curriculum.english: Let's table this discussion for now.

curriculum.question: Business & Leadership
curriculum.korean: 오늘 참석해 주신 모든 분께 감사드립니다.
curriculum.english: Thank you all for joining today.

curriculum.question: Business & Leadership
curriculum.english: Let's get down to business.

curriculum.question: Business & Leadership
curriculum.english: First on the agenda is the marketing plan.

curriculum.question: Business & Leadership
curriculum.english: I would like to hand it over to Sarah.

curriculum.question: Business & Leadership
curriculum.english: Does anyone have any comments on this?

curriculum.question: Business & Leadership
curriculum.english: Let's move on to the next topic.

curriculum.question: Business & Leadership
curriculum.english: To wrap up, let's review the action items.

curriculum.question: Business & Leadership
curriculum.english: We are running out of time.

curriculum.question: Business & Leadership
curriculum.korean: 그 점에 대해 자세히 설명해 주시겠습니까?
curriculum.english: Could you elaborate on that point?

curriculum.question: Business & Leadership
curriculum.english: Meeting adjourned.

curriculum.question: Business & Leadership
curriculum.korean: 이 프로젝트에 대한 당신의 노고에 감사합니다.
curriculum.english: I appreciate your hard work on this project.

curriculum.question: Business & Leadership
curriculum.english: There is room for improvement in your communication.

curriculum.question: Business & Leadership
curriculum.english: Let's discuss how we can support your growth.

chunks.text: how we can support your growth

curriculum.question: Business & Leadership
curriculum.english: Your performance has exceeded expectations.

curriculum.question: Business & Leadership
curriculum.korean: 이상적으로는, 더 주도적인 모습을 보고 싶습니다.
curriculum.english: Ideally, I would like to see more initiative.

curriculum.question: Business & Leadership
curriculum.english: Please take this feedback constructively.

curriculum.question: Business & Leadership
curriculum.english: You handled the client very well.

curriculum.question: Business & Leadership
curriculum.korean: 다음 분기를 위한 명확한 목표를 세웁시다.
curriculum.english: Let's set some clear goals for next quarter.

curriculum.question: Business & Leadership
curriculum.english: I am confident in your ability to succeed.

curriculum.question: Business & Leadership
curriculum.english: Keep up the good work.

curriculum.english: Let's table this discussion for now.
